post.title: canon sd 850is memory
post.content: hi i bought a canon sd 850 is with a 2 gb external memory card in oct 2007. when i bought the camera, i was told that the memory was expandable till 2 gb. i plan to buy an additional memory card. i wanted to know whether a 4 gb or an 8 gb memory card work with this camera. my trip begins thursday evening...so please respond fast! thanks in advance
